summary: Vincent is an ex-soldier with PTSD who is hired to protect the wife and child of a wealthy Lebanese businessman while he's out of town. Despite the apparent tranquility in Maryland, Vincent perceives an external threat.
cast: Matthias Schoenaerts|Diane Kruger|Paul Hamy|Zaïd Errougui-Demonsant|Percy Kemp|Victor Pontecorvo|Michaël Dauber|Franck Torrecillas|Chems Eddine|Philippe Haddad|Jean-Louis Coulloc'h|Hubert Rollet|Rachid Hafassa|David Léotard|Rabia Elatache|Arthur Vercken|Serge Michel|Anaïs Couette|Christian Bianchi|Christophe Lefranc|Alain Lazzoun|Fabien Baïardi|Paul Vallespi
title: Disorder: El protector
